text: Tomás Herrera Martinez (December 21, 1950 – October 18, 2020) was a Cuban basketball player. He won the bronze medal with the men's national team at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany. Martinez died on October 18, 2020 at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Cuba Category:Cuban basketball players
title: Tomás Herrera Martínez
